name: Makerville
description:
This is a constant work-in-progress game built based on the Makerville Community during regular Mottzy Makes streams. This will be an ongoing work-in-progress for the foreseeable future as the community helps drive what we're making and where we're going! Each new release will see updates to the map that people can download an explore. 

The initial implementations are nothing more than a simple map with characters to interact with, but there's more to come!
